Articles.Content:
it's very light even if it carries 4 kerbals. also safer (usually, at least one of them survives the crash)

![qxLeHgW.png](http://i.imgur.com/qxLeHgW.png)

control from docking port

[http://kerbalx.com/rdem/cheapPod](http://kerbalx.com/rdem/cheapPod)

So I'm guessing this is a little below "economy" class in terms of luxury...

Hard to imagine they're not packed in there like sardines. :|
More like this is "beggar" class seating.
Can they get out?.. Can they breathe??
Just put a handle on one side, so when we turn it a kerbal will pop out ^^
So much more spacious than some airlines! \*COUGH\* China Airlines \*COUGH\*
